name: Great Divide
notes: Venture through the frozen wastes of the Great Divide, home of the Coldain dwarves, Kromrif giants, and the mighty Tizmak!

npcs.name: Momo
utterances: Hello hello, my friend!  Come, come see what Momo has to offer!  I have many things - MANY THINGS - to help you be stronger!  Momo has trinkets, and jewelry, and curios from all over the Great Divide and Eastern Wastes!
